com.tollparking.entity

Class Parking

extends java.lang.Object

      Parking(int standardSlotCapacity, int kw20SlotCapacity, int kw50SlotCapacity)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Parking

        public Parking(int standardSlotCapacity,
               int kw20SlotCapacity,
               int kw50SlotCapacity)
        throws InvalidCapacityException
        Creates a new parking with a default pricing policy (PricingPerHourPolicy with an amount set to BigDecimal.ZERO)
        Parameters:
        standardSlotCapacity - number of the standard slots available
        kw20SlotCapacity - number of the 20Kw slots available
        kw50SlotCapacity - number of 50Kw slots available
        Throws:
        InvalidCapacityException - if either of the capacities given are negative

      • Parking

        public Parking(int standardSlotCapacity,
               int kw20SlotCapacity,
               int kw50SlotCapacity,
               PricingPolicy pricingPolicy)
        throws InvalidCapacityException
        Creates a new parking with the following parameters
        Parameters:
        standardSlotCapacity - number of the standard slots available
        kw20SlotCapacity - number of the 20Kw slots available
        kw50SlotCapacity - number of 50Kw slots available
        pricingPolicy - the pricing policy associated with the parking. If the pricing policy is null, a default pricing policy will be given with a BigDecimal.ZERO amount per hour
        Throws:
        InvalidCapacityException - if either of the slot capacities given are negative

    • Method Detail

      • parkVehicle

        public Ticket parkVehicle(VehicleType vehicleType)
        Checks in a vehicle in the parking
        Parameters:
        vehicleType - the vehicle type to park
        Returns:
        null if there are no spaces available for the given vehicle type or a Ticket having a unique id and a startDate set to the current date.

      • removeVehicle

        public Ticket removeVehicle(Ticket ticket)
                     throws TicketNotFoundException
        Removes a vehicle from the parking
        Parameters:
        ticket - received at parking time
        Returns:
        the ticket with the amount to be paid calculated
        Throws:
        TicketNotFoundException - if the ticket given is not found
